SecretZone.text: There's a warm, inviting light ahead.

SecretZone.name: You
SecretZone.text: Maybe this race isn't for me.

SecretZone.name: You
SecretZone.text: All that fighting, all that struggle...

SecretZone.name: You
SecretZone.text: Perhaps there's peace in letting go.

GoodEnding_Egg.name: The Egg
GoodEnding_Egg.text: You've come so far, little one.

GoodEnding_Egg.name: The Egg
GoodEnding_Egg.text: Through trials of the mind, you proved your worth.

GoodEnding_Egg.name: The Egg
GoodEnding_Egg.text: No blood on your hands. No violence in your heart.

GoodEnding_Egg.name: The Egg
GoodEnding_Egg.text: These are the traits I've waited for.

GoodEnding_Egg.name: The Egg
GoodEnding_Egg.text: A new life begins. Our life.

DoorethyL0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0.text: Oh!!! A new one! Hi hi~~~! ^^

DoorethyL0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0.text: Killing them was not necessary FOR NOW eh?? :3

DoorethyL0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0.text: I'm Doorethy! I-I'm supposed to stop you but... that sounds liwdke work... vv

DoorethyL0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0.text: How about a deal? Solve all my puzzles and I'll handle your siblings!!! :3

DoorethyL0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL0.text: ORRR~~ kill everyoneeee with cold blooddd!!!!! ^^

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Swam further no~ no~! Hehe… how’s it feel bein’ tiny, huh?

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Maaaybe I’ll let you pass… IF you smash those weird pillars everywhere!

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Honestly tho… there’s sooo many of you and I’m waaay too tired >_<

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: So~ why not help me and I’ll let you go further?

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Orrrr… you’ve got a gun for no reason, riiight?

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Since you're a good boy, u probably gonna find em pillars eh??

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Since you already stink of blood >< I'm sure you gonna do some banging again

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: You’re kinda lucky~ there’s one right in front of me!

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Some peeps do that whole "pacifist run" thing...

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Like from Undertale ya know tehee~!

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: But like… why not be a little worse? :>>

DoorethyL1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL1.text: Go on! Shoo shoo! Break stuff! Surprise me!

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Quite a mess you made earlier..... ToT

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: You actually searched all em pillars!! YAY XD

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: This place is quite interesting reallyy...

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Elevator n stuffs... floating buttons... weird humming sounds...

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: I dont even know what the developers were thinking with this puzzle... huhuhu

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Your brothers n you are really into the race now... :000

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: All scrambling for that one seat to go up... sigh

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Im pretty sure those valves attract em—your brothers, my swiggly thing!

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Or idk... maybe u can attract em or sumthin yourself hehe~ :3

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Agghh! Ikaw na bahala dyans! Figure it out, wiggly disaster~ <3

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Bye bye for now, see u above tiny one~! ✨

DoorethyL2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL2.text: Don't fall too much... or do. Makes it funnier. Tehe~! :pp

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: You really are stinky... but worse than them.

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: And so...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Alive? But...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Well hello there, tiny one!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Care to help me again, hmm?

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: You came so far!!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Can’t actually believe you helped me.

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: No brothers can actually be like you! You’re smart! :3

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Can’t actually believe you did all of my work!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: You blitzin’ around, ya da yada, boogsh boogsh!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: You really are crazy...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Anyways~!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: You’re now deeper into this place ^^!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Problem though...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: This place got messed up a few weeks ago... :(((

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Now it’s way more dangerous!! Ughhh...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Well...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: This is the only place to go deeper for your wiggly business.

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: AND I....

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: SAY, this gotta be the most hardest level you need to finish! :p LOLZ

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Wanna help me again~~?

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Pls pls, good wiggly thing :3333

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Pls pls, crazy little one??? uwu

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: As if you had other options! Tehee~ :p

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: So this place used to deliver proteins and stuff...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: And now it’s all messed up, you see </3.

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Though! It’s still functional!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: The doors only though... T-T huhuhuhu

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Workers used to place boxes on those red buttons.

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: So...

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Put them back to make this place functional again—and you get out too!!!

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Win-win for the both of us, eyh~? :p

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Why not try it out after I get deleted, ok?? <3

DoorethyL3_0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_0.text: Now go on!! Do your work!

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: I got bigger as well! XD

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: Seems those Smiley guys are heavy enough to activate the buttons...

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: If there’s a way to stop them from "moving" ....

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: Now now, you gonna do it more! :P

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: They’re scattered everywhere, but you’re an adventurer—this gonna be easy for you!

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: Remember that I said this place is now more dangerous?

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: There’s some green gooey stuff that can hurt realy bad </3w

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: You can see it naman to your camera nue?? :3

DoorethyL3_1.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_1.text: So be wary of that, kay~? ^^

DoorethyL3_2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_2.text: I’m pretty damn sure you used those huge guys, eyh!? >:(

DoorethyL3_2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_2.text: I’m pretty damn sure you placed all those boxes to the center, eyh!?

DoorethyL3_2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_2.text: Since you’ve done your part, I’mma delete myself now!

DoorethyL3_2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL3_2.text: I hope you’ll survive what’s next, wiggly guy! :pp

DoorethyL4_Game0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game0.text: Well Hello there mr wiggly guy!

DoorethyL4_Game0.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game0.text: Quite an interesting place for such place eyh~? :3

Line4.name: Doorethy
Line4.text: No pressure… okay, maybe a little!

DorrethyL4_game2.name: Doorethy
DorrethyL4_game2.text: Sayang no? One tiny mistake lang~

DorrethyL4_game2.name: Doorethy
DorrethyL4_game2.text: Go ahead, try again… I dare you

Line1.name: Doorethy
Line1.text: Like, no?? That was sooo not it.

Line3.name: Doorethy
Line3.text: Try again, ha? I’m literally watching you.

Line4.name: Doorethy
Line4.text: Think harder this time nmn baby! ToT

DorrethyL4_game4.name: Doorethy
DorrethyL4_game4.text: Hmmph! :p I can’t believe nanalo ka talaga..!

DorrethyL4_game4.name: Doorethy
DorrethyL4_game4.text: But know I won't go easy on ya to the last level ha! >;D nye!

Line0.name: Doorethy
Line0.text: Wow, look at you following rules. Good puppy.

Line2.name: Doorethy
Line2.text: Keep this up, maybe I’ll reward you later~

Line3.name: Doorethy
Line3.text: But, like, don’t get too comfy, okay~?

Line4.name: Doorethy
Line4.text: Rules are fun, not boring, diba?

DorrethyL4_game6.name: Doorethy
DorrethyL4_game6.text: sigh… seriously, why am I even trying?

DorrethyL4_game6.name: Doorethy
DorrethyL4_game6.text: Maybe you are too much for me, huh?

DorrethyL4_game6.name: Doorethy
DorrethyL4_game6.text: But next time, you’re gonna pay for this.

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: Well hello wiggly thing~! It's you again!

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: Can't believe you actually escaped that very greeny, slimy, headache-inducing place… :000

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: The place works properly now—all thanks to you! YAY XD

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: Putting boxes… or putting corpses to ease your life… ganuns ganuns talaga, eyh? Hehe~

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: I'm pretty damn sure you chose to stack those cute little boxes like a good wiggly boy, right? :3 <3

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: I'm pretty damn sure you left a trail of innocent worker corpses just to make things easier, didn't you? </3

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: What matters is you're here now~ Still swimming! Still breathing! Still… causing chaos~

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: And still killing everything in your path, hmm? </3

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: After this silly chat… it's gonna be the last level, kay?

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: Your actual business—the real reason you're wiggling through all this mess—should be waiting there. ^^

DoorethyL4_game7.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_game7.text: Oh wait—there's gonna be another Doorethy up ahead, probably ready to block you or judge you or something dramatic.

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: Well hellooo there, mr. wiggly guy!

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: You actually showed up… in THIS place :3

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: Look at it… the place makes no sense right??? ... ><

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: I bet you’re already regretting every life choice that led you here, hehe.

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: I could just leave you here to slowly dissolve into glitter particles…

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: …but you’ve been kinda cute about the whole ‘surviving so far’ thing, so maybe I’ll be nice. For now.

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: I’ve prepared something extra special just for you po~

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: Oh right... You guys don't know it yet.

DoorethyL4_Game8.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game8.text: But I know you know it right? ;) tehe!

DoorethyL4_Game9.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_Game9.text: you should talk to the other Doorethy ahead..

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: Sighing now… there’s a door again, eyh? :(

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: Are you really have such a slow attention span??? </3

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: And with all your killings too… </3

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: Are you just that slow, wiggly guy?? Uhuhuhu ToT

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: I know you are good! I know that…

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: Errr… the game is almost done… huhuhu

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: This may be the last time we talk na…

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: I mean… you wiggled all the way here. Through green slime and floating nonsense and everything.

DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.name: Doorethy
DoorethyL4_DoorAgain.text: Even if you were a bit… messy… sometimes… </3

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: That was so sweet of you... and horrifying. <3

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: Do you know who it is, hm? :)

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: All living objects... all those little messes you left behind...

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: And here you are. Still wiggling. Still playing.

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: The ones who built this whole twisted playground...

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: The ones who scripted every door, every valve, every impossible choice...

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: Maybe you're not the monster after all?

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: Maybe you're just... following the code they wrote for you.

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: Is it that fun for you?

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: Yeah, you. The one holding the controls. :))

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: You kept choosing the red path, didn't you?

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: Every time. Every reset. Every 'just one more try'.

DoorethyEnding_Bad2.name: Doorethy
DoorethyEnding_Bad2.text: ...cuz you're not living past the next few dialogues.

MonsterEnding_Bad.name: Monster
MonsterEnding_Bad.text: I WE AND I WE WILL HAVE… OUR MY REVENGE!!

Sperm1.name: Sibling
Sperm1.text: You think you’re faster than me? HA!

Sperm6.name: Sibling
Sperm6.text: Do we get medals for this?

Sperm10.name: Sibling
Sperm10.text: Stop! I need a snack first!

Sperm11.name: Sibling
Sperm11.text: Wait, is this even the finish line?

Sperm12.name: Sibling
Sperm12.text: Ahhh! I’m dizzy! Spin me again!

Sperm13.name: Sibling
Sperm13.text: I swear I saw the developer blinking…

Sperm16.name: Sibling
Sperm16.text: Is it supposed to taste… like this?

Sperm17.name: Sibling
Sperm17.text: I feel… like dialogue… like, literal text.

Sperm21.name: Sibling
Sperm21.text: Stop editing me! I’m not a draft!

Sperm22.name: Sibling
Sperm22.text: Can someone get a map? I’m lost…

Sperm25.name: Sibling
Sperm25.text: Why am I talking… like this… to you?!

Sperm26.name: Sibling
Sperm26.text: I’m the chosen one… no, I’M the chosen one!

Sperm27.name: Sibling
Sperm27.text: Is this a loop? Are we stuck?!

Sperm28.name: Sibling
Sperm28.text: I think I just invented a new move!

Sperm29.name: Sibling
Sperm29.text: Wait… do I have stats? Can I level up?!

WBC4.name: White Blood Cell
WBC4.text: Is that… a tail? Ew. Gross.

WBC5.name: White Blood Cell
WBC5.text: Its the 20th time you guys came in.

WBC9.name: White Blood Cell
WBC9.text: Freeze! Or I’ll… uh… freeze you!

WBC14.name: White Blood Cell
WBC14.text: You’re literally made of protein… gross.

WBC15.name: White Blood Cell
WBC15.text: Uhh... Last week your siblings visited us.

WBC17.name: White Blood Cell
WBC17.text: Is this… a dialogue system? WHAT?!

WBC18.name: White Blood Cell
WBC18.text: I can SEE the editor! I SEE EVERYTHING!

WBC23.name: White Blood Cell
WBC23.text: Freeze frame! Wait… I think I’m frozen!

WBC25.name: White Blood Cell
WBC25.text: Stop running! You’re making me dizzy!

Sperm0_1.name: Sibling
Sperm0_1.text: No way, I called it first! Are you blind?!

Sperm1_1.name: Sibling
Sperm1_1.text: I’ve trained my tail for this moment!

Sperm2_1.name: Sibling
Sperm2_1.text: Is this some kind of… maze?!

Sperm2_2.name: Sibling
Sperm2_2.text: I think I saw a checkpoint somewhere…

Sperm4_1.name: Sibling
Sperm4_1.text: I feel like someone’s typing me…

Sperm6_1.name: Sibling
Sperm6_1.text: I want a gold tail medal!

Sperm9_1.name: Sibling
Sperm9_1.text: Oh no… do they control us?!

Sperm9_2.name: Sibling
Sperm9_2.text: I don’t want to be a test subject!

Sperm10_1.name: Sibling
Sperm10_1.text: I can’t race on an empty stomach!

Sperm11_1.name: Sibling
Sperm11_1.text: I think we went the wrong way!

Sperm13_1.name: Sibling
Sperm13_1.text: Is this some kind of… cheat code?

Sperm16_1.name: Sibling
Sperm16_1.text: Ew… definitely not what I expected!

Sperm17_1.name: Sibling
Sperm17_1.text: Someone please put me in italics…

Sperm22_1.name: Sibling
Sperm22_1.text: I swear I just circled the same place!

Sperm26_1.name: Sibling
Sperm26_1.text: No, seriously, everyone look at me!

Sperm27_1.name: Sibling
Sperm27_1.text: I think we need a break…

Sperm29_1.name: Sibling
Sperm29_1.text: I need EXP… I need XP… now!

WBC0_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC0_1.text: They can’t escape… not on my watch!

WBC6_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC6_1.text: This is gonna mess up my patrol!

WBC10_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC10_1.text: We have duties to do… but I’m chatting anyway!

WBC14_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC14_1.text: I can’t believe this is my life…

WBC18_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC18_1.text: Your every move… tracked… observed… mocked!

WBC19_3.name: White Blood Cell
WBC19_3.text: I need a break… I swear…

WBC25_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC25_1.text: I can’t keep up like this!

WBC26_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC26_1.text: How do you even live like this?!

WBC27_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC27_1.text: Is this existence… or a simulation?!

WBC29_1.name: White Blood Cell
WBC29_1.text: I hate them… I really do…

Level5Good_Entry.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Entry.text: You've chosen the path of wisdom over wrath.

Level5Good_Entry.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Entry.text: Before you can join with me, you must prove your mind is worthy.

Level5Good_Entry.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Entry.text: Five trials of knowledge await you at these sacred tables.

Level5Good_Entry.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Entry.text: Solve each integral correctly, and the way shall open.

Level5Good_Entry.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Entry.text: But beware... wrong answers carry a price.

Level5Good_Correct.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Correct.text: Well done. Your mind grows sharper.

Level5Good_Wrong.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Wrong.text: Incorrect. The knowledge wounds you. Try again, or seek another path.

Level5Good_Victory.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Victory.text: Through patience and wisdom, you have earned your place.

Level5Good_Victory.name: The Egg
Level5Good_Victory.text: The door opens. Your destiny awaits.
